## This is a demo of R Markdown to show what we can do.

According to the Hofstede dataset, the country with the hightest individualism
was `r max_country2`. The country with the highest collectivism was `r min_country2`.

### Summary of individualism values:
```{r echo=FALSE}
kable(idv_summary2_df)
```

### A table of coutries sorted by individualism scores:
```{r echo=FALSE}
kable(idv_data_df)
```
